languages.text: {n}Без предупреждения конечности гемункула впиваются в вас мертвой хваткой, и визжащее сверло вгрызается в ваш позвоночник. Вы хотите кричать, но не можете — глотка конвульсивно стискивается от боли, не давая сделать ни единого вдоха. Челюсть дергается, разжимаясь и сжимаясь с такой силой, что вы чуть не откусываете себе язык. Когда вы думаете, что уже больше не вынесете, Тервантьяс с хлюпающим хрустом извлекает сверло и закрывает рану какими-то скобами и иглами.{/n}

{n}Without warning, the Haemonculus's limbs seize you in a death grip and a shrieking drill bites into your spine. You want to scream, but you cannot — your throat convulsively constricts in agony, preventing you from drawing a single breath. Your jaw twitches, clenching and unclenching with such force that you nearly bite off your tongue. Just when you think you cannot take any more, Tervantias extracts the drill bit with a squelching crunch and closes the wound with some kind of staples and needles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Без предупреждения конечности гемункула впиваются в вас мертвой хваткой, и визжащее сверло вгрызается в ваш позвоночник. Вы хотите кричать, но не можете — глотка конвульсивно стискивается от боли, не давая сделать ни единого вдоха. Челюсть дергается, разжимаясь и сжимаясь с такой силой, что вы чуть не откусываете себе язык. Когда вы думаете, что уже больше не вынесете, Тервантьяс с хлюпающим хрустом извлекает сверло и закрывает рану какими-то скобами и иглами.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ohne Warnung nehmen dich die Gliedmaßen des Haemonculus in einen tödlichen Griff und du spürst einen kreischenden Bohrer in deiner Wirbelsäule. Du willst schreien, aber es gelingt dir nicht ... deine Kehle verkrampft vor Schmerz und macht dir das Atmen unmöglich. Dein Kiefer öffnet und schließt sich mit einer derartigen Gewalt, dass du dir beinahe die Zunge abbeißt. Gerade als du denkst, du kannst nicht mehr, zieht Tervantias die Bohrspitze mit einem mahlenden Geräusch heraus und schließt die Wunde mit irgendwelchen Klammern und Nadeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Without warning, the Haemonculus's limbs seize you in a death grip and a shrieking drill bites into your spine. You want to scream, but you cannot — your throat convulsively constricts in agony, preventing you from drawing a single breath. Just when you think you cannot take any more, Tervantias extracts the drill bit with a squelching crunch and closes the wound with some kind of staples and needles.{/n}

Du willst schreien, aber es gelingt dir nicht ... deine Kehle verkrampft vor Schmerz und macht dir das Atmen unmöglich. Dein Kiefer öffnet und schließt sich mit einer derartigen Gewalt, dass du dir beinahe die Zunge abbeißt. languages.text: {n}Sans prévenir, les membres de l'hémoncule vous saisissent fermement et une foreuse commence à percer votre colonne vertébrale dans un vrombissement strident. Vous voulez crier, mais en êtes incapable ; vous n'arrivez même plus à respirer alors que votre gorge se contracte convulsivement sous l'effet de la douleur intolérable. Votre mâchoire se serre et se desserre avec une telle force que vous manquez de vous trancher la langue. Juste au moment où vous pensez ne plus pouvoir supporter ce supplice, Tervantias retire la foreuse dans un bruit de succion, puis referme la blessure avec des agrafes et des aiguilles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Without warning, the Haemonculus's limbs seize you in a death grip and a shrieking drill bites into your spine. You want to scream, but you cannot — your throat convulsively constricts in agony, preventing you from drawing a single breath. Your jaw twitches, clenching and unclenching with such force that you nearly bite off your tongue. Just when you think you cannot take any more, Tervantias extracts the drill bit with a squelching crunch and closes the wound with some kind of staples and needles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sin mayor advertencia, las extremidades del Hemónculo te aferran con una fuerza colosal y un taladro chirriante se clava en tu espalda. Quieres gritar, pero no puedes: tu garganta se contrae en convulsiones agónicas, impidiéndote tomar un solo aliento. Tu mandíbula, incontrolable, aprieta y se afloja con tanta fuerza que casi te arrancas la lengua. Justo cuando crees que no puedes soportar un instante más, Tervantias extrae el taladro con crujido húmedo y cierra la herida con lo que parecen ser grapas y agujas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Without warning, the Haemonculus's limbs seize you in a death grip and a shrieking drill bites into your spine. You want to scream, but you cannot — your throat convulsively constricts in agony, preventing you from drawing a single breath. Your jaw twitches, clenching and unclenching with such force that you nearly bite off your tongue. Just when you think you cannot take any more, Tervantias extracts the drill bit with a squelching crunch and closes the wound with some kind of staples and needles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}予告もなく、ハモンキュラスの手足が身の危険を感じるほどの強さであなたを掴み、鋭いドリルが背骨に食い込んだ。叫びたくても叫べない。喉が苦痛のあまり痙攣し、息ひとつ吸えなかった。顎がガクガクと動き、凄まじい力で強まったり緩んだり、舌を噛みちぎりそうになる。これ以上は耐えられないと思ったその時、テルヴァンティアスがビチャビチャと音を立ててドリルの先を体から抜き、ホチキスと針のようなもので傷口を塞いだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Without warning, the Haemonculus's limbs seize you in a death grip and a shrieking drill bites into your spine. You want to scream, but you cannot — your throat convulsively constricts in agony, preventing you from drawing a single breath. Your jaw twitches, clenching and unclenching with such force that you nearly bite off your tongue. Just when you think you cannot take any more, Tervantias extracts the drill bit with a squelching crunch and closes the wound with some kind of staples and needles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}予告もなく、ハモンキュラスの手足が身の危険を感じるほどの強さであなたを掴み、鋭いドリルが背骨に食い込んだ。叫びたくても叫べない。喉が苦痛のあまり痙攣し、息ひとつ吸えなかった。顎がガクガクと動き、凄まじい力で強まったり緩んだり、舌を噛みちぎりそうになる。これ以上は耐えられないと思ったその時、テルヴァンティアスがビチャビチャと音を立ててドリルの先を体から抜き、ホチキスと針のようなもので傷口を塞いだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}血伶人毫无征兆地伸出了附肢，将你死死地固定住。嘶嘶作响的钻头刺入了你的脊椎，你想放声尖叫，但却喊不出来。由于剧痛，你的喉咙痉挛地收缩着，让你无法呼吸。你的下巴不住地抽搐，紧咬又松开，几乎要把你自己的舌头咬下来。就在你觉得已经再也无法忍受的时候，特万提亚斯发出了嘎吱嘎吱的响声，抽出了钻头，用尖针与某种类似订书钉的东西缝住了你的伤口。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Without warning, the Haemonculus's limbs seize you in a death grip and a shrieking drill bites into your spine. You want to scream, but you cannot — your throat convulsively constricts in agony, preventing you from drawing a single breath. Your jaw twitches, clenching and unclenching with such force that you nearly bite off your tongue. Just when you think you cannot take any more, Tervantias extracts the drill bit with a squelching crunch and closes the wound with some kind of staples and needles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Haimonkulus'un uzuvlarının seni ansızın ölümcül bir şekilde kavramasıyla bir matkap, vızıldayarak omurgana giriyor. Çığlık atmak istesen de atamıyorsun, boğazın acıyla kasılarak sıkışıyor, tek bir nefes bile almanı engelliyor. Çenen seğiriyor, ağzın o kadar kuvvetli bir şekilde açılıp kapanıyor ki dilini ısırıp koparacak gibi oluyorsun. Daha fazla dayanamayacağını düşünmeye başladığın anda Tervantias, cıvık bir sesle matkabın ucunu çıkarıyor ve yarayı bir çeşit zımbayla ve iğnelerle kapatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Without warning, the Haemonculus's limbs seize you in a death grip and a shrieking drill bites into your spine. You want to scream, but you cannot — your throat convulsively constricts in agony, preventing you from drawing a single breath. Your jaw twitches, clenching and unclenching with such force that you nearly bite off your tongue. Just when you think you cannot take any more, Tervantias extracts the drill bit with a squelching crunch and closes the wound with some kind of staples and needles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Haimonkulus'un uzuvları seni ansızın ölümcül bir şekilde kavrıyor ve bir matkap, vızıldayarak omurgana giriyor. Çığlık atmak istiyorsun ama atamıyorsun, boğazın acıyla kasılarak sıkışıyor, tek bir nefes bile almanı engelliyor. Çenen seğiriyor, ağzın o kadar kuvvetli bir şekilde açılıp kapanıyor ki dilini ısırıp koparacak gibi oluyorsun. Daha fazla dayanamayacağını düşünmeye başladığın anda Tervantias cıvık bir sesle matkabın ucunu çıkarıyor ve yarayı bir çeşit zımbayla ve iğnelerle kapatıyor.{/n}
